hh3cIpAddrMIB.name: hh3cIpAddrMIB

revisions.description: The initial revision of this MIB module.

hh3cIpAddrMIB.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cIpAddrMIB.description: The MIB module for managing IPv4 address.

hh3cIpAddrSetTable.name: hh3cIpAddrSetTable
hh3cIpAddrSetTable.description: The table of address information is relevant to this entity's IPv4 addresses for setting. The address information that can be read and set in this table is a subset of the address information that can be read in hh3cIpAddrReadTable and ipAddrTable in IP-MIB. This table is used to configure IPv4 addresses of an interface identified by hh3cIpAddrSetIfIndex. When users create or delete an entry in this table, the agent also increases or reduces a corresponding entry in the hh3cIpAddrReadTable and ipAddrTable in IP-MIB. When an interface which has been assigned IPv6 address is deleted, the agent also deletes the entry corresponding to the interface in this table and hh3cIpAddrReadTable. All IPv4 addresses in this table will also show in ipAddrTable in IP-MIB.

hh3cIpAddrSetIfIndex.name: hh3cIpAddrSetIfIndex
hh3cIpAddrSetIfIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of RFC 1573's ifIndex.

hh3cIpAddrSetAddrType.name: hh3cIpAddrSetAddrType
hh3cIpAddrSetAddrType.description: The IP address type to which this entry's address information pertains. The value must be ipv4.

hh3cIpAddrSetAddr.name: hh3cIpAddrSetAddr
hh3cIpAddrSetAddr.description: The IPv4 address to which this entry's address information pertains.

hh3cIpAddrSetMask.name: hh3cIpAddrSetMask
hh3cIpAddrSetMask.description: The subnet mask associated with the IPv4 address of this entry. The value of the mask is an IPv4 address with all the network bits set to 1 and all the hosts bits set to 0.

hh3cIpAddrSetSourceType.name: hh3cIpAddrSetSourceType
hh3cIpAddrSetSourceType.description: Indicate the type of source of the IPv4 address.

hh3cIpAddrSetCatalog.name: hh3cIpAddrSetCatalog
hh3cIpAddrSetCatalog.description: Indicate the category of the IPv4 address.

hh3cIpAddrSetRowStatus.name: hh3cIpAddrSetRowStatus
hh3cIpAddrSetRowStatus.description: This object is used to create a new row or delete an existing row in this table, only support active, createAndGo and destroy.

hh3cIpAddrReadTable.name: hh3cIpAddrReadTable
hh3cIpAddrReadTable.description: The table of address information is relevant to this entity's IP addresses for reading. This is the extension of the ipAddrTable in IP-MIB. All IPv4 addresses in this table will also show in ipAddrTable in IP-MIB.

hh3cIpAddrReadIfIndex.name: hh3cIpAddrReadIfIndex
hh3cIpAddrReadIfIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of RFC 1573's ifIndex.

hh3cIpAddrReadAddrType.name: hh3cIpAddrReadAddrType
hh3cIpAddrReadAddrType.description: The IP address type to which this entry's address information pertains. The value must be ipv4.

hh3cIpAddrReadAddr.name: hh3cIpAddrReadAddr
hh3cIpAddrReadAddr.description: The IPv4 address to which this entry's address information pertains.

hh3cIpAddrReadMask.name: hh3cIpAddrReadMask
hh3cIpAddrReadMask.description: The subnet mask associated with the IPv4 address of this entry. The value of the mask is an IPv4 address with all the network bits set to 1 and all the hosts bits set to 0.

hh3cIpAddrReadSourceType.name: hh3cIpAddrReadSourceType
hh3cIpAddrReadSourceType.description: Indicate the type of source of the IPv4 address.

hh3cIpAddrReadCatalog.name: hh3cIpAddrReadCatalog
hh3cIpAddrReadCatalog.description: Indicate the category of the IPv4 address.

hh3cIpv4AddrTable.name: hh3cIpv4AddrTable
hh3cIpv4AddrTable.description: This table is used to configure primary IPv4 address of an interface identified by ifIndex.

hh3cIpv4AddrAddr.name: hh3cIpv4AddrAddr
hh3cIpv4AddrAddr.description: The IPv4 address to which this entry's address information pertains.

hh3cIpv4AddrMask.name: hh3cIpv4AddrMask
hh3cIpv4AddrMask.description: The subnet mask associated with the IPv4 address of this entry. The value of the mask is an IPv4 address with all the network bits set to 1 and all the hosts bits set to 0.

hh3cIpv4AddrRowStatus.name: hh3cIpv4AddrRowStatus
hh3cIpv4AddrRowStatus.description: This object is used to create a new row or delete an existing row in this table, only support active, notInService, createAndGo and destroy.

hh3cIpAddrNotifyIfIndex.name: hh3cIpAddrNotifyIfIndex
hh3cIpAddrNotifyIfIndex.description: The IP address IfIndex of specified interface on the device.

hh3cIpAddrOldIpAddress.name: hh3cIpAddrOldIpAddress
hh3cIpAddrOldIpAddress.description: The Old IP address of specified interface on the device.

hh3cIpAddrNewIpAddress.name: hh3cIpAddrNewIpAddress
hh3cIpAddrNewIpAddress.description: The New IP address of specified interface on the device.

hh3cIpAddressChangeNotify.name: hh3cIpAddressChangeNotify
hh3cIpAddressChangeNotify.description: This notification will be generated when the IP address of interface is changed. The change maybe originate from NMS, DHCP server or administrator. This notification announces useful IP address change. So it is triggered by significative IP address change.
